video.title: Richie Rich
video.synopsis: After turning his veggies into green energy, Richie Rich earns a trillion dollars overnight and a new life filled with nonstop fun and adventure.

episodes.synopsis: Richie agrees to go to the Swedish House Sensation concert with Murray and Darcy on the same night he promised to be at family game night.
episodes.title: Man$ion Warming

episodes.synopsis: Richie is assigned to do a school report on a foreign country, so he contacts the king of an island to set up a "research" vacation.
episodes.title: Royal Flu$h

episodes.synopsis: Richie and Harper set up their dad, Cliff, on a date. Meanwhile, Darcy and Murray decide that they should be trained as Richie's security detail.
episodes.title: The $et Up

episodes.synopsis: When Richie struggles to write a book report on "The Wizard of Oz," his neighbor Tahj convinces him to make a major motion picture as his report.
episodes.title: The Wonderful Thing$ He Doe$

episodes.synopsis: Harper is left in charge of Richie when Cliff must leave home for the night. Meanwhile, Murray attempts to tutor Tulip in math.
episodes.title: The Madne$$ of Queen Harper

episodes.synopsis: After dealing with numerous disputes between his money spender, Darcy, and his money manager, Murray, Richie decides that the two must trade places.
episodes.title: More or Le$$

episodes.synopsis: Richie, Darcy and Irona go to Antarctica, seeking a new frozen life form. Meanwhile, when Tulip cancels on Harper for girls weekend, Cliff steps in.
episodes.title: $nowball Effect$

episodes.synopsis: When Richie volunteers at a school, he does more harm than good. Meanwhile, Murray adopts Cliff as his big brother.
episodes.title: Good Deed$

episodes.synopsis: Richie is convinced his room is haunted and enlists the help of Darcy, Murray and Irona to try to get rid of the "spirits."
episodes.title: $pooky $tuff

episodes.synopsis: When Irona starts malfunctioning, Richie receives a replacement model, Urona -- and he soon develops his first crush.
episodes.title: Fir$t Love

episodes.synopsis: Tahj tells Richie he wants nothing more than to be in the hip-hop game just like his dad, so Richie does his best to support his friend.
episodes.title: Rapper'$ Delight

episodes.synopsis: Richie is suspicious of his new British neighbor after he notices him copying Richie's life. Meanwhile, Harper hosts a telethon for homeless turtles.
episodes.title: Briti$h Rich

episodes.synopsis: After Richie's house is burglarized, he forms a superhero squad with Darcy and Murray to capture the intruder.
episodes.title: $uperheroe$

episodes.synopsis: World-famous DJ Swedish House Sensation surprises Richie by paying him a visit at home. Meanwhile, Harper gets kicked off her school's debate team.
episodes.title: $tockholm Cowboy

episodes.synopsis: When Richie is named Man of the Year, he struggles to decide who to bring as his guest after only being offered one ticket to the ceremony.
episodes.title: Plu$ One

episodes.synopsis: Richie's future adult self travels back in time to ask for Richie's help. Meanwhile, Harper realizes she made a huge error on her Harvard application.
episodes.title: Back to the Pre$ent

episodes.synopsis: A game designer convinces Richie he should have a game app based on his life. Meanwhile, Cliff helps Harper work on a musical number.
episodes.title: Fun and Game$

episodes.synopsis: Everyone is waiting for Richie to release his next big invention, so he works with Murray, Tahj and his Dad to brainstorm the next big thing.
episodes.title: Wa$hed Up

episodes.synopsis: When Richie, Darcy and Murray learn that their summer camp has burned down, they decide to host all the campers at Richie's house.
episodes.title: Meat the Camper$

episodes.synopsis: Richie, Murray and Tahj all develop crushes on beauty pageant contestants who are in town for a competition.
episodes.title: Ladie$ Man

episodes.synopsis: When their Grandma Barb visits, Richie and Harper discover a surprising family secret. Meanwhile, Darcy hires a personal fashion designer.
episodes.title: Family Tie$
